tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MarketData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    opening_price DECIMAL,
    closing_price DECIMAL,
    high_price DECIMAL,
    low_price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE market_data (
  date DATE,
  symbol VARCHAR(10),
  open_price DECIMAL,
  close_price DECIMAL,
  high_price DECIMAL,
  low_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (
    symbol VARCHAR(50),
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    close_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    high_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    low_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE market_analysis (
    symbol VARCHAR(50),
    date DATE,
    trend VARCHAR(20),
    forecasted_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    confidence_level DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE market_news (
    news_id INT,
    symbol VARCHAR(50),
    news_headline TEXT,
    news_date TIMESTAMP,
    source VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE market_performance (
    symbol VARCHAR(50),
    date DATE,
    performance_index DECIMAL(10, 2),
    volume INT,
    volatility DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE MarketData (
    date DATE,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    open_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    close_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE CompanyInformation (
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(100),
    industry VARCHAR(50),
    founded_date DATE,
    ceo_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE AnalystForecast (
    date DATE,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
    analyst_name VARCHAR(50),
    target_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    rating VARCHAR(10)
);
